snippet: The most significant accusation in the seven-count indictment of Mufid A. Elfgeeh of Rochester asserts that he tried to provide material support and resources to the Islamic State.
abstract: Mufid A Elfgeeh of Rochester, NY, is indicted on charges that he tried to provide material support to Islamic State in Iraq and Syria; authorities say Elfgeeh tried to help three men who said they would undertake jihad, and was planning to kill members of the military who had returned from Iraq.
lead_paragraph: The most significant accusation in the seven-count indictment of Mufid A. Elfgeeh of Rochester asserts that he tried to provide material support and resources to the Islamic State.

headline.main: New York Man Charged With Trying to Support ISIS
headline.print_headline: U.S. Man Charged With Ties to ISIS

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
